function.name: tostring
function.desc: Converts the property to a string.

function.name: AddCallback
function.desc: Adds a new callback to this property which will be called whenever the property's value changes. The syntax for ''callback'' is:\n {{template_overload|{{template_type|void}}|callback|{{template_param|math.Mat3x2}} oldValue,{{template_param|math.Mat3x2}} newValue}}

function.name: AddModifier
function.desc: Adds a new modifier to this property which will be called before the property's value changes. Use this function to appliy changes to the value before it is applied. The syntax for ''modifier'' is:\n {{template_overload|{{template_type|math.Mat3x2}}|callback|{{template_param|math.Mat3x2}} value}}

function.name: InvokeCallbacks
function.desc: Invokes all registered callbacks for this property.

function.name: Get
function.desc: Returns the value of this property.

function.name: Set
function.desc: Changes the value of this property.

function.name: SetLocked
function.desc: Locks or unlocks this property. If the property is locked, its value cannot be changed.

function.name: IsLocked
function.desc: Returns ''true'' if the property is locked.

function.name: Link
function.desc: Links this property to the specified property and clears the previous existing link (if there is one). This property's value will change whenever the value of ''otherProperty'' changes.

function.name: Unlink
function.desc: Clears this property's link if there is one.
